name: Darkness Falls
description:
Darkness Falls is a relaxing survival game, you are the commander of a newly established colony and must expand you colony to 1000 people in order to win, you need to watch your supplies such as food and power in order to survive, the game has a day night cycle and you must prepare for this as your solar power does not work during the night.

the game features an upgrade system that make your buildings more effective

24 hour day/night cycle

population will grow / decrease depending on supplies

you can turn certain buildings on / off.
